title: Street fighter II: the animated movie
creator_credit: Capcom Productions, Kenichi Imai and Gisaburo Sugii
brief_description: Based on the popular video game of the same name. Human civilisation is under attack in the not so distant future. Bison is the evil mastermind who leads the forces of evil and wants to take possession of the world’s best fighters so he can use them to conquer the world. Ken and Ryu are the only two humans in the world with the skill and strength to stop them. What ensues is a mighty battle in the classic clash between the forces of good and evil.
